name: Glitchers
storyline: Trix is a geek and rebellious tween who hates being told what to do and is full of hacks, both in digital and real life. As Trix crosses a portal, she gets trapped into her favorite game. Inside the game, Trix finds allies - Ada, her former avatar and a brute-force clueless warrior, Dude, the most handsome and vain orc of Ruled Earth and a mage apprentice, and Iris, a mysterious and sarcastic mentor. Along with this team of underdogs, Trix faces strange and crazy adventures to defeat the Penultimate Boss and return home.
summary: A geek and rebellious tween gets trapped into her favorite game and will have to learn how to master, or hack, the nonsense rules of a hammy villain and get back home.
